Name: 回纹战棋
About the game: It was so boring during the epidemic that I taught myself UE4 spent months making this war board game that I hope you enjoy. How to play: At the beginning, a person's equipment depends on fighting - doghead, through the battle can be the role of the current enemy and his bag can directly talk strategy. Combat: Choose up to 5 characters to fight against the enemy. Each character can move, attack, and skill at the same time per turn. The main character is randomly assigned one skill per turn from 10 classes. Large map: There are no quests on the map. Players can collect 'baguettes' or characters to achieve the final result. There are several small games in the map.
